scoop bucket list: Lists the buckets that have been added
scoop bucket add:
Add Scoop bucket
eg : scoop bucket add <bucket_name> <bucekt_url>
scoop bucket rm:
Remove Scoop bucket
eg : scoop bucket rm <bucket_name>
scoop search:
Search available apps
eg : scoop search <app>
scoop install -u:
--no-update-scoop
Don't update Scoop before installing if it's outdated
scoop install -a:
--arch <32bit|64bit|arm64>
Use the specified architecture <32bit|64bit|arm64>, if the app supports it
scoop update:
Update apps, or Scoop itself
eg : scoop update [option] <app>
scoop update -f:
--force
Force update even when there isn't a newer version
scoop list:
List installed apps
scoop list [pattern]
eg : scoop list 7  List all installed apps with names of 7
scoop info:
Display information about an app
eg : scoop info 7zip
scoop cache:
Show or clear the download cache
eg : scoop cache <show/rm> <app>
scoop cache show:
See what's in the cache
eg : scoop cache show *
     scoop cache show 7zip
scoop cache rm:
Remove the cache of app
eg : scoop cache rm *
     scoop cache rm 7zip
scoop reset:
Reset an app to resolve conflicts
eg : scoop reset python
     scoop reset python27
scoop cleanup:
Cleanup apps by removing old versions
eg : scoop cleanup [option] <app/*>
scoop prefix:
Returns the path to the specified app
eg : scoop perfix <app>
     scoop perfix 7zip
scoop cat:
Show content of specified manifest
eg : scoop cat <app>
     scoop cat 7zip
scoop checkup: Check for potential problems with Scoop
scoop alias:
Manage scoop aliases
eg : scoop alias add <name> <command> <description>
     scoop alias rm <name> <command>
     scoop alias list
scoop alias add:
Add an Alias
eg : scoop alias add <name> <command> <description>
     scoop alias add upgrade 'scoop update * Updates all apps'
Type 'scoop upgrade' to run 'scoop update *
scoop alias rm:
Remove an Alias
eg : scoop alias rm <name> <command> <description>
     scoop alias rm upgrade 'scoop update * Updates all apps'
scoop shim:
Manipulate Scoop shims
eg : scoop shim [-g] <add/rm/list/info/alter> <shim_name>...
scoop shim add:
Add a custom shim
eg : scoop shim add <shim_name> <command_path> [<args>...]
scoop shim rm:
Remove shims(This could remove shims added by an app manifest)
eg : scoop shim rm <shim_name> [<shim_name>...]
scoop shim list:
List all shims or matching shims
eg : scoop shim list [<shim_name>/<pattern>...]
scoop shim info:
Show a shim's information
eg : scoop shim info <shim_name>
scoop shim alter:
Alternate a shim's target source
eg : scoop shim alter <shim_name>
scoop config:
Get or set configuration values
eg : scoop config <key> <value> -- set
     scoop config <key> -- get
scoop -v:
--version
Print the current version of scoop
scoop setup: Enable scoop for the current user / shell
scoop completions:
Generate scoop completions
You already have completions. You don't need it
